title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Shropshire

ai_serp.title: shropshire.gov.uk How to request permission for flat improvements council

ai_choice.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Shropshire - Choice

Best match.Title: Apply to make changes to your council flat
Best match.Reason: David wants to make small changes to his flat and needs a simple online form to request permission from the housing team, which aligns with this service.

ai_page.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Shropshire - Page
ai_page.body:
404 - Page not found

Page not found
It looks like the page you are looking for has moved, or is no longer available.  Sorry about that.
We regularly check to make sure our content is up to date and sometimes our pages move or get archived as the information changes. If pages are linked across other areas of the council website, sometimes it takes us a bit of time to update all the links. 

Please try our search to find the information you need on our website, or look at our ‘ways to contact us’ page for details of our online services and other ways to reach us.

ai_feedback.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Shropshire - Feedback

feedback.Did the text answer your query?: No, I got a 404 error message instead of the information I needed about requesting permission for flat improvements.
feedback.Was there anything that could have been: Yes, it should have clearly stated where to find the correct page or outlined alternative ways to make my request if the page was missing.
feedback.Is there any way this text could be impr: Providing direct links to the relevant forms or contact options, even if on a different page, would help me get the information I need without confusion.

ai_issue.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Shropshire - Issue

text_improvements.original:
Page not found
  It looks like the page you are looking for has moved, or is no longer available.
text_improvements.issue: The message could be clearer by providing direct links or guidance to find the correct information instead of just stating the page is missing.

text_improvements.original: Please try our search to find the information you need on our website, or look at our ‘ways to contact us’ page for details of our online services and other ways to reach us.
text_improvements.issue: Offering specific alternative actions, such as direct links to forms or contact points, would make it easier for users to find what they need quickly.

text_improvements.original: It looks like the page you are looking for has moved, or is no longer available.
text_improvements.issue: Failing to inform users explicitly about where to access relevant forms or alternative pathways may contribute to their frustration and confusion.

ai_improvement.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Shropshire - Improvement

text_issues.Issue:
Page not found
  It looks like the page you are looking for has moved, or is no longer available.
text_issues.original:
Page not found
  It looks like the page you are looking for has moved, or is no longer available.
text_issues.improvement: The page you are trying to access is not available. Please use the search function or contact us for assistance.
text_issues.why: This clearer, more direct message helps users understand the situation and guides them on the next action, addressing the lack of clarity and reducing frustration.

text_issues.Issue: Please try our search to find the information you need on our website, or look at our ‘ways to contact us’ page for details of our online services and other ways to reach us.
text_issues.original: Please try our search to find the information you need on our website, or look at our ‘ways to contact us’ page for details of our online services and other ways to reach us.
text_issues.improvement: Try using the website search or visit our 'Contact Us' page for alternative ways to get the information about your flat improvement requests.
text_issues.why: Providing specific guidance on where to find relevant forms or contacts makes it easier for the user to locate the information quickly, reducing confusion.

text_issues.Issue: It looks like the page you are looking for has moved, or is no longer available.
text_issues.original: It looks like the page you are looking for has moved, or is no longer available.
text_issues.improvement: The page has been moved or removed. Please visit our main services page or contact us directly for assistance with your flat improvement application.
text_issues.why: Explicitly informing users about where to find relevant forms or contact points helps prevent frustration and makes navigation clearer.
